entry.title: conversion
entry.content:
Working on using Octopress for my blog. Tired of Drupal security updates for something I already spend so little time on. Just cutting out one more thing to maintain in my life. Especially with the baby coming soon.

With Octopress setup, I have a static site with no concern for security or users and and updating is as easy as: $> rake new_post["title"] then edit in my favorite editor, Sublime Text 2, $> rake generate $> rake deploy sextastic.
